sentences.en: Condensation will eventually cause the fabric of the building to rot away.
sentences.cn: 冷凝作用将最终使建筑结构腐朽掉。

sentences.en: Don't be mean with fabric, otherwise curtains will end up looking skimpy.
sentences.cn: 别这么吝啬布料，不然做出来的窗帘会显得特寒酸。

sentences.en: He noticed that fabric was tearing away from the plane's wing.
sentences.cn: 他注意到机翼在一块一块地断裂。

sentences.en: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
sentences.cn: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

sentences.en: our new range of fabrics and wallpapers
sentences.cn: 我们新的织物和墙纸系列

sentences.en: The country’s social fabric is disintegrating.
sentences.cn: 该国的社会结构正在瓦解。

sentences.en: The fabric is strong enough to withstand harsh processing.
sentences.cn: 这种织物非常结实，能经受粗加工。

sentences.en: The fabric was ironed to make the colours fast.
sentences.cn: 为防止掉色，织物已经过熨烫。

sentences.en: The fabric was showing signs of age.
sentences.cn: 这块衣料可以看出岁月留下的痕迹。

sentences.en: The simplest rag-rugs are made with strips of fabric plaited together.
sentences.cn: 最简单的碎布地毯是由碎布条编在一起制成的。

sentences.en: They both loved the fabric, but couldn't find a use for it.
sentences.cn: 他们都很喜爱这块布，可是不知道拿来做什么好。

sentences.en: Tie it with fabric bows that co-ordinate with other furnishings.
sentences.cn: 系上与其他装饰相配的布质蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: Using a fabric conditioner will make clothes easier to handle and iron.
sentences.cn: 使用织物柔顺剂会使衣服打理、熨烫起来更为容易。

sentences.en: Waterproofed fabric pants are more expensive than plastic pants.
sentences.cn: 防水纤维短裤比塑料短裤贵多了。

sentences.en: You can hang lengths of fabric behind the glass.
sentences.cn: 你可以在玻璃后面挂几条织品。

words.tran_cn: 焊接的；组合的，装配式的
制造，组装；伪造，捏造（fabricate的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 涂层织物；胶布；漆布；人造革

trans.tran_en: cloth used for making clothes, curtains etc
